languages.text: "Ну, про вас у меня сомнений нет, все у вас будет тип-топ! А я..." {n}Идира осекается.{/n} "Знаете. Может, проживу я и недолго, зато как следует, на совесть. Оставлю после себя столько баек, ух — рассказывать не перерассказывать! Пусть поминают мое имя за чаркой чего-нибудь пенного, да смеются над историями моих — наших — похождений".

"Well, I have no doubts about you, everything's going to come up roses for you! As for me..." {n}Idira catches herself.{/n} "You know, maybe I won't live long, but it'll be a good life. I'll leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories of my — well, of our exploits."
languages.original_text: "Ну, про вас у меня сомнений нет, все у вас будет тип-топ! А я..." {n}Идира осекается.{/n} "Знаете. Может, проживу я и недолго, зато как следует, на совесть. Оставлю после себя столько баек, ух — рассказывать не перерассказывать! Пусть поминают мое имя за чаркой чего-нибудь пенного, да смеются над историями моих — наших — похождений".

As for me..." {n}Idira catches herself.{/n} "You know, maybe I will not live long, but it is going to be a good life. I will leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories about my — well, about our exploits."

I will leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories about my — well, about our exploits."

I'll leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories of my — well, of our exploits."

I'll leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories of my — well, of our exploits."

languages.text: “你看，你一定能过得很好，这件事情我一点都不怀疑。至于我嘛……”{n}伊迪拉顿了顿。{/n}“如你所知，我可能活不了多久，但活过的这段日子还挺不错的。我会留下很多故事让别人去讲！他们会记住我的名字，让他们一边喝着泡泡酒，一边听着我的——听着咱们的故事，哈哈大笑吧。”
languages.original_text: "Well, I have no doubts about you, everything's going to come up roses for you! As for me..." {n}Idira catches herself.{/n} "You know, maybe I won't live long, but it'll be a good life. I'll leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories of my — well, of our exploits."

traits.locale_text: “你看，你一定能过得很好，这件事情我一点都不怀疑。至于我嘛……”{n}伊迪拉顿了顿。{/n}“如你所知，我可能活不了多久，但活过的这段日子还挺不错的。我会留下很多故事让别人去讲！他们会记住我的名字，让他们一边喝着泡泡酒，一边听着我的——听着咱们的故事，哈哈大笑吧。”

languages.text: «Bueno, ¡en su caso no tengo duda de que todo saldrá a pedir de boca! En cuanto a mí...». {n}Idira recupera la compostura.{/n} «Sí, puede que no viva mucho tiempo, pero será una buena vida. ¡Dejaré muchísimas historias que contar! Quiero que recuerden mi nombre con una jarra bien espumosa y se rían con las historias de mis... bueno, de nuestros logros».
languages.original_text: "Well, I have no doubts about you, everything's going to come up roses for you! As for me..." {n}Idira catches herself.{/n} "You know, maybe I won't live long, but it'll be a good life. I'll leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories of my — well, of our exploits."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, ¡en su caso no tengo duda de que todo saldrá a pedir de boca! En cuanto a mí...». {n}Idira recupera la compostura.{/n} «Sí, puede que no viva mucho tiempo, pero será una buena vida. ¡Dejaré muchísimas historias que contar! Quiero que recuerden mi nombre con una jarra bien espumosa y se rían con las historias de mis... bueno, de nuestros logros».

languages.text: 「ええ、あなたのことを疑ってはいないわ。あなたのすべてが成功するのよ！あたいは…」{n}イディラは思いとどまる。{/n}「長生きはできないかもしれないけど、いい人生を送れると思うの。たくさんの物語を後世に残せるわ！ジョッキで泡の出る酒でも飲みながら、あたいの名前を覚えてもらって、あたいの話…そうね、あたいたちの偉業を聞いて笑ってもらいましょう」
languages.original_text: "Well, I have no doubts about you, everything's going to come up roses for you! As for me..." {n}Idira catches herself.{/n} "You know, maybe I won't live long, but it'll be a good life. I'll leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories of my — well, of our exploits."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、あなたのことを疑ってはいないわ。あなたのすべてが成功するのよ！あたいは…」{n}イディラは思いとどまる。{/n}「長生きはできないかもしれないけど、いい人生を送れると思うの。たくさんの物語を後世に残せるわ！ジョッキで泡の出る酒でも飲みながら、あたいの名前を覚えてもらって、あたいの話…そうね、あたいたちの偉業を聞いて笑ってもらいましょう」

languages.text: "Nun, ich habe keinerlei Zweifel, was Euch angeht. Für Euch wird alles immer rosig sein! Was mich angeht ..." {n}Idira stockt.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, ich werde vielleicht nicht lange leben, aber es wird ein gutes Leben sein. Ich werde so viele Geschichten hinterlassen! Sollen sie sich bei einem Humpen an meinen Namen erinnern und über die Geschichten meiner — nein, unserer Abenteuer lachen."
languages.original_text: "Well, I have no doubts about you, everything's going to come up roses for you! As for me..." {n}Idira catches herself.{/n} "You know, maybe I won't live long, but it'll be a good life. I'll leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories of my — well, of our exploits."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, ich habe keinerlei Zweifel, was Euch angeht. Für Euch wird alles immer rosig sein! Was mich angeht ..." {n}Idira stockt.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, ich werde vielleicht nicht lange leben, aber es wird ein gutes Leben sein. Ich werde so viele Geschichten hinterlassen! Sollen sie sich bei einem Humpen an meinen Namen erinnern und über die Geschichten meiner — nein, unserer Abenteuer lachen."

languages.text: « En ce qui vous concerne, tout se passera bien, je n'ai aucun doute là-dessus ! Quant à moi... » {n}commence-t-elle, puis elle se reprend.{/n} « Vous savez, mes jours sont peut-être comptés, mais j'ai bien l'intention d'en profiter. Je laisserai des tas d'histoires derrière moi ! On évoquera mon souvenir autour d'une bonne mousse et on rira à gorge déployée en racontant mes... euh, nos exploits. »
languages.original_text: "Well, I have no doubts about you, everything's going to come up roses for you! As for me..." {n}Idira catches herself.{/n} "You know, maybe I won't live long, but it'll be a good life. I'll leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories of my — well, of our exploits."

traits.locale_text: « En ce qui vous concerne, tout se passera bien, je n'ai aucun doute là-dessus ! Quant à moi... » {n}commence-t-elle, puis elle se reprend.{/n} « Vous savez, mes jours sont peut-être comptés, mais j'ai bien l'intention d'en profiter. Je laisserai des tas d'histoires derrière moi ! On évoquera mon souvenir autour d'une bonne mousse et on rira à gorge déployée en racontant mes... euh, nos exploits. »

languages.text: "Sana dair içimde hiçbir şüphe yok, senin için her şey yolunda gidecektir! Benim içinse..." {n}İdira kendini topluyor.{/n} "Biliyor musun, belki uzun süre yaşamayacağım ama iyi bir hayat yaşamış olacağım. Arkamda anlatılacak sayısız hikâye bırakacağım! Bir kadehin veya köpüklü bir şeylerin yanında ismimi ansınlar ve benim, daha doğrusu bizim başarılarımıza dair hikâyeler anlatıp gülüşsünler."
languages.original_text: "Well, I have no doubts about you, everything's going to come up roses for you! As for me..." {n}Idira catches herself.{/n} "You know, maybe I won't live long, but it'll be a good life. I'll leave behind so many tales to tell! Let them remember my name over a mug of something foamy and laugh at the stories of my — well, of our exploits."
